      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addIncomingTransactionListener(IncomingTransactionListener newListener)
      Adds a new listener.
      void addNewEvent(IncomingTransactionEvent event)
      Adds a new event to the event db and triggers notification to listeners.
      void confirmEventNotification(IncomingTransactionEvent event)
      marks an event as notified, so the agent won't trigger any notifications from this event.

      gets the list of events stored on file and returns only the pending ones.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventNotificationManager

        public EventNotificationManager()
        default constructor

    • Method Detail

      • setIterationDelay

        public static void setIterationDelay(int seconds)
        Sets the amount of seconds of delay for the iterations of the agent. The amoun of seconds specified here will be the delay of each iteration to notify pending events.
        Parameters:
        seconds - the amount of seconds to wait for each iteration

      • addIncomingTransactionListener

        public void addIncomingTransactionListener(IncomingTransactionListener newListener)
        Adds a new listener. The agent monitoring pending notification events will let these listener know there are events.
        Parameters:
        newListener - the new listener to add

      • removeIncomingTransactionListener

        public void removeIncomingTransactionListener(IncomingTransactionListener listener)
        Removes an existing listener. Removed listener won't be notified of new or pending events.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove

      • addNewEvent

        public void addNewEvent(IncomingTransactionEvent event)
                 throws IOException
        Adds a new event to the event db and triggers notification to listeners.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPendingNotificationEvents

        public List<IncomingTransactionEvent> getPendingNotificationEvents()
        gets the list of events stored on file and returns only the pending ones.
        Returns:
        the list of pending notification events.

      • confirmEventNotification

        public void confirmEventNotification(IncomingTransactionEvent event)
        marks an event as notified, so the agent won't trigger any notifications from this event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to mark as notified.
